arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ لَا تُحَرِّمْ عَلَيَّ رِيْحَ الْجَنَّةِ
وَاجْعَلْنِىْ مِمَّنْ يَشَمُّ رِيْحَهَا وَرَوْحَهَا وَطِيْبَهَا
translation: O Lord! Do not deprive me of the fragrance of Paradise,
and make me of those who smell its fragrance and perfume.
transliteration: waj`alnī mimman yashammu rīḥahā warawḥahā waṭībahā
